channel.title: Hi,I'm Scott. Developer/Founder (Web, Apps, SaaS, Conv. Opt.)
channel.description:
I'm Scott Underwood when I'm not working on client work (Websites, Web Apps, SaaS, WP plugins, Conversion Optimization and custom marketing funnels) I'm working on my own projects.
2014 is the year I'm launching my own products. I'm working on my own SaaS app (ProjectMatches.com) and have a few other ideas I'll be rolling out this year.
I'm a big fan of Rob Walling, Patio11, Amy Hoy, Brennan Dunn and Nathan Barry and hope to duplicate some of their success with products.
I enjoy technology, the web and online business and enjoy chatting it up about all three.
Great to meet you.

item.title: Hi,I'm Scott. Developer/Founder (Web, Apps, SaaS, Conv. Opt.)

I’m Scott Underwood when I’m not working on client work (Websites, Web Apps, SaaS, WP plugins, Conversion Optimization and custom marketing funnels) I’m working on my own projects.

2014 is the year I’m launching my own products. I’m working on my own SaaS app (ProjectMatches.com) and have a few other ideas I’ll be rolling out this year.
